Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class TakeResourcesFromMarket

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.TakeResourcesFromMarket
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractTurnPhase
public class TakeResourcesFromMarket
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbstractTurnPhase
Take Resources From Market action is organized as follows: the current player selects the marbles he wants to take from the market, then he attempts to perform a first positioning phase. If he makes a mistake while positioning the resources the first time, they are placed in the pending resources. Afterwards he has a second opportunity to specify how to place the resources he failed to place. If he fails again, the remaining resources are automatically discarded and the other players move by the correspondent number of positions on their faith track.

  • Method Details

    • takeResourcesFromMarket

      public void takeResourcesFromMarket​(Turn turn, TakeResourcesFromMarketMessage takeResourcesFromMarketMessage) throws InvalidActionException, WhiteEffectMismatchException, NeedPositioningException
      This is the main method of the class. It makes consistency check to avoid corruption.
      Specified by:
      takeResourcesFromMarket in interface AbstractTurnPhase
      Parameters:
      turn - represents the turn in which the action is being performed.
      takeResourcesFromMarketMessage - message containing all the instructions coming from the player
      Throws:
      InvalidActionException - if a normal action has been already performed in the turn.
      WhiteEffectMismatchException - if the player has selected a wrong number of effects or selected ones don't match with player's leader effects.
      NeedPositioningException - if a certain resource cannot be placed in warehouse and required further actions from the player.

    • convertWhiteMarbles

      private void convertWhiteMarbles​(Turn turn, java.util.List<Marble> marbles, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> whiteEffects)
      Sets effect for white marbles as indicated
      Parameters:
      turn - in which the action is performed
      marbles - the list of marbles containing some white marbles to convert.
      whiteEffects - the list containing, for each white marble, the index of the convert marble leader card to active.

      Converts each marble obtained to the corresponding ResourceType.
      Parameters:
      marbles - the list of the marbles obtained.
      whereToPutMarbles - the list containing the indications on where to put each marble.

    • convertTypeToMarbleEffect

      private WhiteMarbleEffect convertTypeToMarbleEffect​(ResourceType type)
      Method used to convert the Resource Type associated to a convert marble leader card to the correspondent WhiteMarbleEffect instance of the Strategy pattern.
      Parameters:
      type - of the convert marble.
      Returns:
      the instance of the Strategy pattern used to convert white marbles.

    • handlePositioning

      private void handlePositioning​(Warehouse playerWarehouse)
      Performs the positioning of the resources obtained from the marbles into the Warehouse as indicated in the previous phases of the action. If the positioning action fails, the resource is added to the pending resources.
      Parameters:
      playerWarehouse - where to position the resources.

    • handlePositioning

      public void handlePositioning​(Turn turn, java.util.List<Pair<ResourceType,​MarbleDestination>> pairList)
      Method used to handle the positioning of the pending resources when the current player wrongly performed a first attempt to position them. If he makes any mistake, the remaining resources are automatically discarded and the other players move by the correspondent number of positions on their faith track.
      Parameters:
      turn - in which the action is performed.
      pairList - the list containing, for each resource, the warehouse section where to position it.

      Checks whether the player has correctly indicated all the resources to put when he has to some resources to settle.
      Parameters:
      resourcesToPut - indicated by the client.
      Returns:
      the check validity.

    • moveCurrPlayerMarker

      private void moveCurrPlayerMarker​(Turn turn)
      Moves the current player's faith marker by the number of faith points obtained during the action.
      Parameters:
      turn - in which the action is performed.

    • concludeTurnPhase

      public void concludeTurnPhase​(Turn turn)
      Concludes the action moving the other players on their faith track by the number of resources discarded by the current player during this action.
      Specified by:
      concludeTurnPhase in interface AbstractTurnPhase
      Parameters:
      turn - in which the action is performed.

    • performPositioning

      private void performPositioning​(Warehouse playerWarehouse, int i) throws DepotOutOfBoundsException, IncompatibleResourceTypeException, DepotNotFoundException
      Performs the positioning of a resource type in the player's Warehouse as indicated in the previous phases of the action.
      Parameters:
      playerWarehouse - where to put the resources.
      i - the index of the resource to place in whereToPutResources list.
      Throws:
      DepotOutOfBoundsException - if a resource is put in a full depot.
      IncompatibleResourceTypeException - if the type of a resource is incompatible to the current configuration of the warehouse.
      DepotNotFoundException - if a resource is added to a depot that not exists in player's warehouse.

    • getEarnedResources

      private java.util.List<ResourceType> getEarnedResources()
      Filters all the resources obtained from the marbles to get only the resources that the player wants to keep.
      Returns:
      the resources that the player wants to keep.

    • checkValidWhiteEffects

      public boolean checkValidWhiteEffects​(Turn turn, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> whiteEffects, java.util.List<ReducedMarble> requestedMarbles)
      Checks whether the client has correctly indicated how to convert each white marble. Client has to indicate how to convert each white marble only if he has two convert marble leader effects active.
      Parameters:
      turn - in which the action is performed.
      whiteEffects - the list containing, for each white marble, the index of the convert marble leader card to active.
      requestedMarbles - the list of the marbles requested by the client.
      Returns:
      the check validity.
